actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to prohibit States from charging child support recipients for the collection of child support.
short_title: Elimination of the Single Parent Tax Act of 2008

summary.text: Elimination of Single Parent Tax Act of 2008 - Amends part D (Child Support and Establishment of Paternity) of title IV of the Social Security Act to prohibit states from charging child support recipients for the collection of child support.

titles.title: Elimination of the Single Parent Tax Act of 2008
A bill to amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to prohibit States from charging child support recipients for the collection of child support.
